price: 18. Too korosut yekke Qidim kee moominiin geyte iisa Yallak taniih cakki kinni, diggah Yalli koroositeh yan marih urna mala Boolayse-le.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
